member.name: N:MoreDateTime
member.summary: Contains all provider interfaces, the date and time range classes and minor helpers

member.name: N:MoreDateTime.Extensions
member.summary: All extension methods are in this namespace, namely the DateTimeExtensions, DateOnlyExtensions, TimeOnlyExtensions and the TimeSpanExtensions

member.name: N:MoreDateTime.Interfaces
member.summary: Contains the interfaces for ranges and providers
